text: Chisimu aŵala ŵaakunkana Allah ni achimitenga Ŵakwe, ni kusakaga ali nkulekanganya chilikati cha Allah ni achimitenga Ŵakwe, nikuŵechetaga (yanti): “Ŵane tukwakulupilila nambo ŵane tukwakana,” ni kusakaga kujigala litala lya chilikati cha yalakweyi (ngaŵa lya Usilamu usyesyene kapena lya ukafili)
